lead_paragraph: A U.N. report, leaked in draft form last week, accuses Rwandan forces of massacring civilians and possibly committing genocide in Congo years ago.

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject

keywords.name: organizations

snippet: A U.N. report, leaked in draft form last week, accuses Rwandan forces of massacring civilians and possibly committing genocide in Congo years ago.

headline.main: Rwanda Threatens to Pull Peacekeepers From Darfur
headline.print_headline: Rwanda Threatens to Leave Sudan Mission

byline.original: By JEFFREY GETTLEMAN and JOSH KRON
byline.contributor: Jeffrey Gettleman reported from Nairobi, and Josh Kron from Goma, Democratic Republic of Congo.
